languages.text: "Мы зовемся Зловещим воем, и знак наш известен всем Волкам". {n}Гигант с гордостью указывает на наплечник, украшенный похожими на клыки черными клиньями.{/n} "Мы — старые волки, много видавшие и прошедшие". {n}Тень тревоги омрачает хвастливую радость на лице воина.{/n}

"We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы зовемся Зловещим воем, и знак наш известен всем Волкам". {n}Гигант с гордостью указывает на наплечник, украшенный похожими на клыки черными клиньями.{/n} "Мы — старые волки, много видавшие и прошедшие". {n}Тень тревоги омрачает хвастливую радость на лице воина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We call ourselves the Famehungry, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我们自称为‘怒嚎者’，所有狼群都知道我们的印记。”{n}乌尔法自豪地指着自己的护肩，上面粗糙地刻着黑色獠牙的图案。{/n}“我们都是见多识广、忍辱负重的老狼。”{n}一丝担忧的阴影掠过他的脸庞，他自夸的语气也变得不再那么兴致勃勃。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们自称为‘渴名者’，所有狼群都知道我们的印记。”{n}乌尔法自豪地指着自己的护肩，上面粗糙地刻着黑色獠牙的图案。{/n}“我们都是见多识广、忍辱负重的老狼。”{n}一丝担忧的阴影掠过他的脸庞，他自夸的语气也变得不再那么兴致勃勃。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Nos llamamos el Aullido Torvo, y nuestro símbolo es conocido entre todos los Lobos». {n}Ulfar señala orgullosamente su hombrera, decorada por unos rudimentarios colmillos negros.{/n} «Somos lobos viejos que hemos visto mucho y resistido mucho». {n}La sombra de la inquietud apaga un poco la exuberancia jactanciosa del guerrero.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nos llamamos los Hambrientos de fama, y nuestro símbolo es conocido entre todos los Lobos». {n}Ulfar señala orgullosamente su hombrera, decorada por unos rudimentarios colmillos negros.{/n} «Somos lobos viejos que hemos visto mucho y resistido mucho». {n}La sombra de la inquietud apaga un poco la exuberancia jactanciosa del guerrero.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺たちは自分たちを『破滅の咆哮』と呼んでいる。そして俺達の印はすべて狼として知られている」{n}ウルファーは誇らしげに、黒い牙が粗雑に描かれた肩章を指差す。{/n}「俺達は多くのことを見、多くのことに耐えてきた年老いた狼だ」{n}自慢げな戦士の高揚感に、不穏な影が差す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちは自分たちを『破滅の咆哮』と呼んでいる。そして俺達の印はすべて狼として知られている」{n}ウルファーは誇らしげに、黒い牙が粗雑に描かれた肩章を指差す。{/n}「俺達は多くのことを見、多くのことに耐えてきた年老いた狼だ」{n}自慢げな戦士の高揚感に、不穏な影が差す。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wir nennen uns die Baleful Howl, und unser Zeichen ist allen Wolves bekannt." {n}Ulfar deutet stolz auf seine Schulterklappe, auf der eine krude Abbildung schwarzer Reißzähne prangt.{/n} "Wir sind alte Wolves, die viel gesehen und viel erlitten haben." {n}Ein Schatten der Unruhe dämpft den prahlerischen Überschwang des Kriegers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen uns die Famehungry, die Ruhmhungrigen, und unser Zeichen ist alles Wolves bekannt." {n}Ulfar deutet stolz auf seine Schulterklappe, auf der eine krude Abbildung schwarzer Reißzähne prangt.{/n} "Wir sind alte Wolves, die viel gesehen und viel erlitten haben." {n}Ein Schatten der Unruhe dämpft den prahlerischen Überschwang des Kriegers.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Nous nous surnommons les Hurleurs sanguinaires, et notre signe est connu de tous les Space Wolves. » {n}Ulfar montre fièrement son épaulière, qui porte pour blason une grossière représentation de crocs noirs.{/n} « Nous sommes de vieux Space Wolves qui ont vu et enduré beaucoup de choses. » {n}L'exubérance vantarde du guerrier est atténuée par une inquiétude passagère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous surnommons les Dévoreurs de gloire, et notre signe est connu de tous les Space Wolves. » {n}Ulfar montre fièrement son épaulière, qui porte pour blason une grossière représentation de crocs noirs.{/n} « Nous sommes de vieux Space Wolves qui ont vu et enduré beaucoup de choses. » {n}L'exubérance vantarde du guerrier est atténuée par une inquiétude passagère.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

languages.text: "Kendimize Uğursuz Uluma deriz, simgemizi bilmeyen Kurt yoktur." {n}Ulfar, basit bir kara diş tasviriyle süslenmiş omuz vatkasını gururla gösteriyor.{/n} "Çok şey görüp geçirmiş, yaşlı Kurtlarız biz." {n}Savaşçının gururlu neşesini bir tedirginlik gölgeliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the Baleful Howl, and our sign is known to all Wolves." {n}Ulfar proudly points at his shoulder pad, which is emblazoned with a crude depiction of black fangs.{/n} "We are old Wolves who have seen much and endured much." {n}A shadow of disquiet dampens the warrior's boastful exuberance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kendimize Uğursuz Uluma deriz ve simgemizi bilmeyen Kurt yoktur." {n}Ulfar, basit bir kara diş tasviriyle süslenmiş omuz vatkasını gururla gösteriyor.{/n} "Çok şey görüp geçirmiş, yaşlı Kurtlarız biz." {n}Savaşçının gururlu neşesini bir tedirginlik gölgeliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
